title: If I am late to the mosque, can I pray all the Sunnah after the fard, do I pray in sets of 2
transcript: i am led to the mosque can i pray all six sunnah of the dhara after the first prayer do i have to make it by dividing into two to two he says if i came late for congregation and i joined the imam can i pray the four raqqa of that's prior to the fart and the two raka afterwards together the answer is yes but if you mean together by praying six raka's with one salaam at the end no this is not permissible you have to pray two offer salaam two offer salam and to then offer salam
